# EntryReference constructor

A reference to an entry value within an image file directory.

```csharp
public EntryReference(ImageFileDirectory ImageFileDirectory, Tag Tag)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| ImageFileDirectory | The image file directory containing the entry. |
| Tag | The tag for the entry within the image file directory. |
